Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Purview Information Protection - Support for Cross Cloud Protected Files
Description:
This feature will enable customers working across cloud boundaries - worldwide cloud to GCC High or Microsoft 365 operated by 21-Vianet, to share files protected with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels. Recipients in the other cloud will be able to view, edit, print, and more based on rights assigned by the document owner.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025
